1.text: Place the table in a large, spacious room or area.

2.text: Set the 4 chairs so they face the table, with 1 chair at each corner.

3.text: Place 1 cup on each corner of the table.

4.text: Fill the cups with 12 ounces (340 g) of beer.

5.text: Divide into 2 teams of 2 people and have each player sit in a chair.

6.text: Set a minimum height that the die must reach on each throw.

7.text: Do not say the numbers “5” or “7” during the game.

8.text: Have the eldest player throw the dice underhanded across the table.

9.text: Catch the dice with 1 hand if it bounces off the table so your opponent doesn't get a point.

10.text: Chug your beer if the dice lands in your cup or your teammate’s cup.

11.text: Throw the dice after both of your opponents have thrown it.

12.text: Drink whenever you drop the dice or miss the table on a throw.

13.text: Score when you throw the die so it bounces off the table without being caught.

14.text: Continue playing until 1 team has a total score of 5.
